creator: Sweet Media Marketing Ltda.
descriptionHtml:
WELCOME TO HELIX FRUIT

Visit the world of fruit and pass each level by getting the colored ball through the obstacles in each fruit slice.

NEW LEVELS IN EVERY WORLD
As you pass through new worlds each stage gets harder and harder. Do you think you can jump through all the fruits in the game?!

The secret is to pay close attention so you don't touch the obstacles in each level. Let the ball fall to the last fruit slice, and to do this:

Move the slice from one side to the other;
You should let the ball fall as far as possible in one go, but don't let it touch the obstacles;
As the ball gains momentum, it destroys what it touches.


PLAY AND EARN REAL MONEY
Choose how you want to make withdraws, whether by playing or by indicating others!
Here are some secrets on how to get lots of points in Helix Fruit

Play, and complete the levels (+3 points/level);
Sign up (+35 points);
Use a referral code from a friend (+40 points);
Participate in sponsored promotions and offers (+2 to +5 points).

You also get paid for every 10 valid referrals you bring to the game using your code. A valid indication must include the following:

Use your correct code;
Register;
Play up to level 10.

The more coins you accumulate, the more money you can withdraw!
Every withdrawal request takes up to 20 days for approval, since it goes through a review process to make sure your score was acquired without violating any terms or conditions of the game.

SUPPORT
Sweet cares about your Helix Fruit experience, so it would be awesome if you could rate our game and give us feedback. Your opinions help us improve.

If you have any specific questions, please contact our support team email at: contato@sweetpanels.com.

Our team will do whatever we can to find the best solution for you!

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
By downloading Sweet Helix Fruit you agree to our Privacy Policy and the app's Terms of Use, which are available at:

https://sweetbonus.com.br/games/privacy-policy/ptbr
https://sweetbonus.com.br/games/terms-conditions/ptbr

OUR SOCIAL NETWORKS
Stay tuned to all of our releases! Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Tik Tok, and Kwai at @sweetmediaoficial.

Thanks for playing Helix Fruit!
